name: Escape From Human Fortress
description:
After the world war, humans conquered the lands.
During the new reign, you are captured and tortured deep in the dungeons of a human fortress.Now you just want to live again.
Escape from the evil and dark caves...

Hi! My name is Gabriel and I'm a solo developer. The game is not finish but this is a little demo that I am currently working on. It's an early version so I will be updating the game regularly. Please let me know your opinion I would like to hear from you.

Many thanks and see you soon!

Follow the development:

Twitter

Controls

KeyboardJoystickMovementSpaceAJumpXXAttackArrowsD-PadMovement

This demo is free and I accept any type of donations that will help in finalizing the development.
